Name: Journey to Wellness
Description: Artwork Commission for Mary Bird Perkins Cancer Center in Baton Rouge, LA, creating healing-focused digital art installation for healthcare environment.

Name: Diamonds in Dystopia
Description: Digital art exhibition at Baton Rouge Gallery featuring interactive digital media works exploring themes of contrast and transformation in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: XR Landscapes - Temporal Aesthetics
Description: Extended reality artwork XR Landscapes presented in the Temporal Aesthetics exhibition at Baton Rouge Arts Council Firehouse Gallery, exploring virtual and augmented reality landscapes in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Diamonds in Dystopia - SXSW
Description: Digital art installation Diamonds in Dystopia presented at South by Southwest (SXSW) festival, showcasing interactive digital media work to international audience in Austin, TX.

Name: Spotlight - BREW
Description: Digital art installation Spotlight presented at BREW: Baton Rouge Entrepreneurship Week at Shaw Center for the Arts, highlighting innovation and creativity in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Causeway - Louisiana Contemporary
Description: Digital art work Causeway featured in Louisiana Contemporary exhibition at Ogden Museum of Southern Art, exploring themes of connection and place in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Causeway - Griffith University
Description: International presentation of digital art work Causeway at Griffith University in Brisbane, Australia, showcasing Louisiana-themed digital media to international audience.

Name: Reflection - LSU Annual Dance Concert
Description: Digital art work Reflection created for LSU Annual Dance Concert at Shaver Theater, integrating digital media with live dance performance in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Causeway - New Orleans Poetry Festival
Description: Digital art work Causeway presented at New Orleans Poetry Festival, creating multimedia experience combining digital art with literary performance in New Orleans, LA.

Name: Diamonds in Dystopia - TEDxLSU
Description: Digital art installation Diamonds in Dystopia presented at TEDxLSU at LSU Student Union, integrating digital media with educational and inspirational content in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Causeway - Digital Divide
Description: Digital art work Causeway featured in Digital Divide exhibition at LSU Digital Media Center, exploring themes of technology access and social connection in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Space Cadet - Uncommon Thread
Description: Digital art work Space Cadet presented in Uncommon Thread exhibition at Goodwood Library in Baton Rouge, LA, available at http://drive.google.com/open?id=1pK1TynQmDtxCZKgNI0ySV86ddqwpkNEHuTndpsYIHaI

Name: Causeway - Katrina & Rita Research Response
Description: Digital art work Causeway presented in Katrina & Rita: A Decade of Research & Response exhibition at LSU Digital Media Center, reflecting on hurricane impact and recovery in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Humming Mississippi - ISEA
Description: Digital art work Humming Mississippi presented in Resonance exhibition at ISEA: International Symposium for Electronic Art at New York University Art Center Project Space in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Name: Projection Vine, Spine and Mirror, Genome - Prospect.3
Description: Multiple digital art works Projection Vine, Spine and Mirror, and Genome presented in Prospect.3+Baton Rouge: Notes Upriver exhibition in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Pierrot Lunaire Op. 21 Interactive Audio Video Performance
Description: Interactive Audio Video Performance of Pierrot Lunaire Op. 21 at LSU School of Music Recital Hall, combining digital media with classical music performance in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Humming Mississippi - NIME
Description: Digital art work Humming Mississippi presented at NIME: New Interfaces for Musical Expression at Goldsmiths University in London, England, exploring interactive digital media and music interfaces.

Name: Orbs, Humming Mississippi, IMG_1984, Conglomeration - Right Here Now
Description: Multiple digital art works Orbs, Humming Mississippi, IMG_1984, and Conglomeration presented in Right Here Now exhibition at LSU Museum of Art in Baton Rouge, LA.

Name: Uncertain Languages: Subz_2001 & IMG_1984 - Solo Show
Description: Solo exhibition Uncertain Languages featuring digital art works Subz_2001 & IMG_1984 at Demolden Video Projects in Santander, Spain.

Name: Conglomeration - Currents Santa Fe
Description: Digital art work Conglomeration presented at Currents: Santa Fe International New Media Festival in Santa Fe, NM, showcasing innovative digital media art.

Name: Conglomeration - Different Games
Description: Digital art work Conglomeration presented at Different Games conference at NYU in New York, NY, exploring alternative approaches to digital media and gaming.

Name: IMG 1984 - Art & Copyright
Description: Digital art work IMG 1984 featured in Art & Copyright online exhibition at Interartive, exploring themes of intellectual property and digital media.

Name: Change Industries - Hot Mess: Peepshow
Description: Digital art work Change Industries presented in Hot Mess: Peepshow exhibition at Buffalo Media Resources in Buffalo, NY, exploring themes of technology and voyeurism.

Name: Social Media Center - social(dis)order
Description: Digital art installation Social Media Center presented in social(dis)order exhibition at Glassell Gallery in Baton Rouge, LA, exploring social media and digital communication themes.

Name: mememe - GLI.TC/H 2112
Description: Digital art work mememe presented at GLI.TC/H 2112, OP3N R3P0 in Chicago IL, exploring glitch aesthetics and digital identity.

Name: MPG - SLEO
Description: Digital art work MPG presented at Symposium on Laptop Ensembles & Orchestras (SLEO) in Baton Rouge, LA, exploring digital music and performance technologies.

Name: Water Cube - Cavortress
Description: Digital art work Water Cube presented in Cavortress exhibition at LeMieux Gallery in New Orleans, LA, exploring themes of fluidity and digital space.

Name: Tear Catchers - Beyond the Brickyard
Description: Digital art work Tear Catchers presented in Beyond the Brickyard exhibition at Archie Bray Foundation in Helena, MT, exploring themes of emotion and digital expression.

Name: Language Visualizations - CCT
Description: Digital art work Language Visualizations presented at Center for Computation & Technology in Baton Rouge, LA, exploring computational approaches to language and communication.

Name: What is Digital Art - Gallery 229
Description: Digital art exhibition What is Digital Art presented at Gallery 229 in Baton Rouge, LA, exploring definitions and boundaries of digital art practice.

Name: Phone Talks - Maker Faire
Description: Interactive digital art work Phone Talks presented at Maker Faire in Pawtucket, RI, exploring themes of communication and technology in maker culture.

Name: Orbs - Beautiful and Barbaric at All Times
Description: Digital art work Orbs presented in Beautiful and Barbaric at All Times exhibition at Art Jail Gallery in New York, NY, exploring themes of beauty and brutality in digital media.

Name: IAM: Indians, Astronauts, & Magic - Accumulations
Description: Digital art work IAM: Indians, Astronauts, & Magic presented in Accumulations of Opaque Experiments at Rhode Island Convention Center in Providence, RI, exploring themes of identity and mythology.

Name: Tipi Experiment - Stetson Alumni Exhibition
Description: Digital art work Tipi Experiment presented in Stetson University Selected Alumni Exhibition at Duncan Gallery in DeLand, FL, exploring themes of cultural identity and space.

Name: Static - Digital + Media Biennial
Description: Digital art work Static presented in Digital + Media Biennial at Sol Koffler Gallery in Providence, RI, exploring themes of noise and signal in digital media.

Name: Park Cube City - Public Installation
Description: Public digital art installation Park Cube City at Goddard Park in East Greenwich, RI, creating interactive digital experience in public space.

Name: Change Industries 2.0 - Downtown Providence
Description: Digital art installation Change Industries 2.0 in Downtown Providence, RI, exploring themes of urban transformation and digital intervention.

Name: Movie Subz - Brown University
Description: Digital art work Movie Subz presented at Brown University in Providence, RI, exploring themes of cinema and subtitle culture in digital media.

Name: MPG - Digital Art in the Post-Digital Age
Description: Digital art work MPG presented in Digital Art in the Post-Digital Age exhibition at Polk Museum of Art in Lakeland, FL, exploring post-digital aesthetics and theory.

Name: Change Industries 1.0 - Downtown Providence
Description: Digital art installation Change Industries 1.0 in Downtown Providence, RI, exploring themes of industrial transformation and digital media intervention.

Name: Echo Cell - Stetson University Thesis Show
Description: Digital art work Echo Cell presented in Stetson University Thesis Show at Duncan Gallery of Art in DeLand, FL, representing culmination of undergraduate digital art studies.

Name: MPG - Fountain Art Fair
Description: Digital art work MPG presented at Fountain Art Fair (Art Basel) in Miami, FL, showcasing digital media work in international contemporary art context.

Name: Crunch - Stetson University Promotional CD
Description: Digital art work Crunch featured on Stetson University Promotional CD in DeLand, FL, representing student digital art achievements.

Name: MPG - Fusing Touchstone Art and Media Festival
Description: Digital art work MPG presented at Fusing Touchstone Art and Media Festival at Stetson University in DeLand, FL, exploring convergence of traditional and digital media.

Name: California License - Mirror Pal Concert
Description: Digital art work California License presented at Mirror Pal Concert at Backbooth in Orlando, FL, integrating digital media with live music performance.

Name: MPG - New West Electronic Arts & Music Festival
Description: Digital art work MPG presented at New West Electronic Arts & Music Festival at San Diego State University in San Diego, CA, exploring electronic arts and music convergence.

Name: Vengen - Digital Arts Night
Description: Digital art work Vengen presented at Digital Arts Night at Stetson University in DeLand, FL, showcasing student digital art innovations.

Name: Bottle Wall - SHIPWRECK!
Description: Digital art work Bottle Wall presented in SHIPWRECK! exhibition at Odyssey Marine Museum in New Orleans, LA, exploring themes of maritime history and digital archaeology.

Name: Shadow Hands - Art Night
Description: Digital art work Shadow Hands presented at Art Night at University of Tampa in Tampa, FL, exploring themes of gesture and digital interaction.
